items.question: How can I download the mobile application?
items.answer: Visit the App Store (iOS) or Google Play Store (Android), search for our app by name, and download it for free.

items.question: How do I report a bug or technical issue?
items.answer: Use the 'Report a Problem' option in the Help Center or email our support team at support@example.com.

items.question: How do I contact customer support?
items.answer: You can reach our team via the 'Help Center' chat or by emailing support@example.com.

items.question: Where can I find the terms of service?
items.answer: Scroll to the bottom of our website and click on 'Terms of Service'.

items.question: Do you support integration with Google Drive?
items.answer: Yes, go to 'Integrations' in settings and connect your Google account to enable Drive sync.

items.question: What browsers are supported?
items.answer: We officially support the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
